common.siteDescription: Free online tools including age calculator, military discharge calculator, character counter, JSON formatter, loan calculator, BMI calculator and more.

footer.description: We provide various free online tools. Discover useful everyday tools like age calculator, character counter and more.

loanCalculator.title: Loan Calculator
loanCalculator.fullTitle: Loan Calculator - Monthly Payment & Interest Calculator
loanCalculator.description: Calculate monthly payments, total interest for mortgages, personal loans. Supports equal principal and interest, equal principal, and bullet repayment methods.

savingsCalculator.title: Savings Calculator
savingsCalculator.fullTitle: Savings Interest Calculator - Pre-tax & After-tax Interest
savingsCalculator.description: Calculate actual interest earned and maturity amount after taxes for deposits and savings accounts.

brokerageFeeCalculator.title: Real Estate Fee Calculator
brokerageFeeCalculator.description: Calculate real estate brokerage fees for property sales, rentals. Based on latest rate tables.

severanceCalculator.title: Severance Calculator
severanceCalculator.fullTitle: Severance Pay Calculator - Calculate Retirement Benefits
severanceCalculator.description: Calculate severance pay and retirement income tax based on employment period and average salary.

bmiCalculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmiCalculator.fullTitle: BMI Calculator - Body Mass Index & Obesity Level
bmiCalculator.description: Calculate your BMI (Body Mass Index) and check your weight status. Based on WHO Asia-Pacific standards.

bmrCalculator.title: BMR Calculator
bmrCalculator.description: Calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) for diet planning.

calorieBurnCalculator.title: Calorie Burn Calculator
calorieBurnCalculator.fullTitle: Exercise Calorie Burn Calculator - Calories Burned by Activity
calorieBurnCalculator.description: Calculate calories burned for various activities. Supports 50+ activities including running, walking, swimming, hiking.

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.fullTitle: Age Calculator - Calculate Exact Age from Birthdate
ageCalculator.description: Enter your birthdate to calculate your exact age in years, months, and days. Also shows Korean age and year age.

militaryCalculator.title: Military Service Calculator
militaryCalculator.description: Enter your enlistment date to calculate discharge date, days served, and days remaining for Korean military service.

gpaCalculator.title: GPA Calculator
gpaCalculator.fullTitle: GPA Calculator - Calculate Grade Point Average
gpaCalculator.description: Enter course credits and grades to calculate your cumulative GPA. Supports 4.5 scale.

salaryCalculator.title: Net Salary Calculator
salaryCalculator.fullTitle: Net Salary Calculator - After-tax Take-home Pay
salaryCalculator.description: Enter your gross salary to calculate net take-home pay after social insurance and income tax deductions.

zodiacCalculator.title: Zodiac Calculator
zodiacCalculator.description: Find your zodiac sign and Chinese zodiac animal based on your birthdate. Also shows days until your next birthday.

ddayCalculator.title: D-Day Calculator
ddayCalculator.fullTitle: D-Day Calculator - Days Until Target Date
ddayCalculator.description: Calculate days remaining until a specific date. Perfect for anniversaries, exams, trips, and important events.

characterCounter.title: Character Counter
characterCounter.fullTitle: Character Counter - Count Characters, Words, Bytes
characterCounter.description: Count characters, words, and bytes in your text in real-time. Useful for essays, resumes, and social media posts.

percentCalculator.title: Percent Calculator
percentCalculator.description: Easy percentage calculations! What is B% of A? What percent is A of B? Calculate discounts and changes.

unitConverter.title: Unit Converter
unitConverter.fullTitle: Unit Converter - Length, Area, Weight, Temperature
unitConverter.description: Convert between units easily! Length, area, weight, temperature, data storage. Includes pyeong to square meters.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.fullTitle: JSON Formatter & Validator - Pretty Print JSON
jsonFormatter.description: Format and validate JSON code. Pretty print JSON and check for syntax errors. Essential tool for developers.

base64Tool.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64Tool.fullTitle: Base64 Encoder/Decoder - Convert Text to Base64
base64Tool.description: Encode text to Base64 or decode Base64 to original text. Supports UTF-8 encoding.

urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlEncoder.description: Safely encode or decode URLs with special characters. Supports encodeURI and encodeURIComponent.

loremIpsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremIpsum.fullTitle: Lorem Ipsum Generator - Dummy Text Generator
loremIpsum.description: Generate placeholder text for websites, apps, and documents. Create paragraphs, sentences, or words.

spinWheel.title: Spin the Wheel
spinWheel.fullTitle: Spin the Wheel - Random Selection Game
spinWheel.description: Enter items on the wheel and spin to randomly select one. Interactive game with animations.

foodSlotMachine.title: Food Slot Machine
foodSlotMachine.fullTitle: Food Slot Machine - What to Eat Today?
foodSlotMachine.description: Pull the lever and let the slot machine decide your meal from various cuisines.

scratchCard.title: Scratch Card
scratchCard.fullTitle: Scratch Card Game - Reveal the Prize
scratchCard.description: Scratch the screen to reveal hidden penalties or prizes!

teamGenerator.title: Team Generator
teamGenerator.fullTitle: Random Team Generator - Fair Group Assignment
teamGenerator.description: Enter participant names and create balanced teams fairly.

magicConch.title: Magic Conch Shell
magicConch.description: Ask a question and the Magic Conch will give you a random answer.

fortuneCookie.title: Fortune Cookie
fortuneCookie.description: Click the cookie to break it and reveal your daily fortune or wisdom.

reactionTest.title: Reaction Time Test
reactionTest.description: Click when the screen turns green to measure your reaction speed and rank.

wordFrequency.title: Word Frequency Analyzer
wordFrequency.fullTitle: Word Frequency Analyzer - Text Analysis Tool
wordFrequency.description: Enter text to see which words are used most frequently, ranked by count.

browserInfo.title: Browser Info
browserInfo.description: Check your current browser version, operating system, and system information.

reserveCalculator.title: Reserve Forces Calculator
reserveCalculator.description: Enter your discharge year to check your reserve forces year and training type.

sleepCalculator.title: Sleep Cycle Calculator
sleepCalculator.fullTitle: Sleep Cycle Calculator - Optimal Wake Time
sleepCalculator.description: Calculate the best time to wake up based on REM sleep cycles.

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.fullTitle: QR Code Generator - Create QR Codes for Text & URLs
qrGenerator.description: Convert text, URLs, contacts to QR codes. Download as PNG/SVG with color customization.

caseConverter.title: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Convert text to uppercase, lowercase, title case, camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case and more.

coinFlip.title: Coin Flip
coinFlip.fullTitle: Coin Flip - Heads or Tails Random Decision
coinFlip.description: Flip a coin with 3D animation to decide heads or tails. Includes result statistics.

diceRoller.title: Dice Roller
diceRoller.fullTitle: Digital Dice Roller - D6, D20 and More
diceRoller.description: Roll 1-6 dice at once. Supports D4, D6, D8, D10, D12, D20, D100 for TRPG games.

mandalart.title: Mandal-Art Chart
mandalart.fullTitle: Mandal-Art Goal Setting - Ohtani Style 9x9 Chart
mandalart.description: Set your core goal and 8 sub-goals using the Mandal-Art planning method.

koreanRomanizer.title: Korean Romanizer
koreanRomanizer.fullTitle: Korean to Roman Letters - Name Romanization
koreanRomanizer.description: Convert Korean names to standard romanization. Useful for passport English names.

numberBaseConverter.title: Number Base Converter
numberBaseConverter.description: Convert between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal. Includes bit operations.

listShuffler.title: List Shuffler
listShuffler.description: Randomly shuffle items in a list. Great for presentation order, draws, and random sorting.

timer.title: Web Timer
timer.description: Timer, stopwatch, and Pomodoro timer. Optimized for focus and time management.

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert between HEX, RGB, and HSL color codes. Includes complementary and analogous colors.

stickyNote.title: Sticky Note
stickyNote.description: Quickly write and save notes in your browser. Auto-save with dark mode support.

webpConverter.title: WebP Converter
webpConverter.fullTitle: Image to WebP Converter - PNG/JPG to WebP
webpConverter.description: Convert PNG/JPG images to WebP format to reduce file size. Quality control available.

ipPortChecker.title: IP & Port Checker
ipPortChecker.description: Check your public IP address and location. Test if ports are open.

placeholderImage.title: Placeholder Image
placeholderImage.fullTitle: Placeholder Image Generator - Dummy Image URL
placeholderImage.description: Generate placeholder images with custom size and color as URLs.

svgBlobGenerator.title: SVG Blob Generator
svgBlobGenerator.fullTitle: SVG Blob Generator - Organic Curved Shapes
svgBlobGenerator.description: Generate smooth, organic SVG blob shapes for web design backgrounds.

socialMediaSizeGuide.title: Social Media Size Guide
socialMediaSizeGuide.description: Recommended image sizes for Instagram, YouTube, TikTok and more.

cssFilterLab.title: CSS Filter Lab
cssFilterLab.fullTitle: CSS Filter Lab - Image Filter Effects
cssFilterLab.description: Apply CSS filters like Blur, Brightness, Sepia to images and copy the code.

cssPatternGenerator.title: CSS Pattern Generator
cssPatternGenerator.fullTitle: CSS Background Pattern Generator - Dots, Checks, Stripes
cssPatternGenerator.description: Generate repeating patterns like dots, checks, stripes using pure CSS.

logoSafeArea.title: Logo Safe Area Generator
logoSafeArea.fullTitle: Logo Safe Area Generator - Brand Guideline Grid
logoSafeArea.description: Add safety margins and grids to logo files for brand guideline compliance.

faviconPreview.title: Favicon Preview
faviconPreview.fullTitle: Favicon Preview - Browser Tab & Mobile Simulation
faviconPreview.description: Preview how your favicon looks in browser tabs, bookmarks, and mobile screens.

buttonGenerator.title: Button Design Factory
buttonGenerator.fullTitle: Button Design Factory - Tailwind CSS Button Generator
buttonGenerator.description: Create stylish buttons with rounded corners, shadows, hover effects and export as Tailwind CSS.

colorBlindnessSimulator.title: Color Blindness Simulator
colorBlindnessSimulator.fullTitle: Color Blindness Simulator - Web Accessibility Test
colorBlindnessSimulator.description: See how your design looks to users with color vision deficiency.

screenResolution.title: Screen Resolution Checker
screenResolution.fullTitle: Screen Resolution Checker - Monitor Resolution & PPI
screenResolution.description: Check your device's logical/physical resolution, pixel density, and PPI.

discountCalculator.title: Discount Calculator
discountCalculator.description: Calculate the final sale price after a percentage discount and see how much you save.

unitPriceCalculator.title: Unit Price Calculator
unitPriceCalculator.fullTitle: Unit Price Calculator - Best Value Comparison
unitPriceCalculator.description: Compare the unit price of products by quantity or weight to find the best deal.

sizeConverter.title: Clothing Size Converter
sizeConverter.fullTitle: Clothing & Shoe Size Converter - US / UK / EU
sizeConverter.description: Convert clothing and shoe sizes between US, UK, EU, and other international standards.

waterIntakeCalculator.title: Water Intake Calculator
waterIntakeCalculator.fullTitle: Daily Water Intake Calculator - Hydration Guide
waterIntakeCalculator.description: Calculate your recommended daily water intake based on your weight and activity level.

htmlStripper.title: HTML Tag Remover
htmlStripper.fullTitle: HTML Tag Stripper - Remove HTML Tags from Text
htmlStripper.description: Paste HTML and instantly strip all tags to extract clean plain text.

morseCode.title: Morse Code Translator
morseCode.description: Convert text to Morse code or decode Morse code back to text. Supports audio playback.

metronome.title: Metronome
metronome.description: Free online metronome with adjustable BPM for music practice and rhythm training.

chordTransposer.title: Chord Transposer
chordTransposer.fullTitle: Guitar Chord Transposer - Transpose Chords by Semitone
chordTransposer.description: Transpose guitar chord charts up or down by any number of semitones.

paletteGenerator.title: Color Palette Generator
paletteGenerator.fullTitle: Color Palette Generator - Create Harmonious Color Schemes
paletteGenerator.description: Generate beautiful color palettes automatically from a base color using color theory.

gradientGenerator.title: CSS Gradient Generator
gradientGenerator.fullTitle: CSS Gradient Generator - Linear & Radial Gradients
gradientGenerator.description: Create CSS linear and radial gradients visually and copy the ready-to-use code.

boxShadowGenerator.title: Box Shadow Generator
boxShadowGenerator.fullTitle: CSS Box Shadow Generator - Visual Shadow Builder
boxShadowGenerator.description: Design CSS box-shadow effects visually and copy the generated CSS code.

glassmorphismGenerator.title: Glassmorphism Generator
glassmorphismGenerator.fullTitle: Glassmorphism CSS Generator - Frosted Glass UI Effect
glassmorphismGenerator.description: Create trendy frosted glass UI effects using CSS backdrop-filter and export the code.

neumorphismGenerator.title: Neumorphism Generator
neumorphismGenerator.fullTitle: Neumorphism CSS Generator - Soft UI Design
neumorphismGenerator.description: Generate soft-UI neumorphism components and copy the CSS code instantly.

cssGridGenerator.title: CSS Grid Generator
cssGridGenerator.fullTitle: CSS Grid Layout Generator - Visual Grid Builder
cssGridGenerator.description: Visually create CSS grid layouts with custom rows, columns, and gaps, then copy the code.

caffeineCalculator.title: Caffeine Calculator
caffeineCalculator.fullTitle: Caffeine Intake Calculator - Coffee, Tea & Energy Drinks
caffeineCalculator.description: Track your daily caffeine consumption and find out if you're within safe limits.

lunarCalendar.title: Lunar Calendar
lunarCalendar.fullTitle: Lunar Calendar Converter - Lunar to Solar Date
lunarCalendar.description: Convert dates between the lunar and solar calendar. Find traditional lunar dates.

diffChecker.title: Text Diff Checker
diffChecker.description: Compare two text blocks and instantly highlight exactly what changed. Great for code reviews.

faviconGenerator.title: Favicon Generator
faviconGenerator.fullTitle: Favicon Generator - Create ICO & PNG Icons from Image
faviconGenerator.description: Generate favicons in all required sizes (16×16, 32×32, 180×180) from any uploaded image.

exifRemover.title: EXIF Data Remover
exifRemover.fullTitle: EXIF Metadata Remover - Strip GPS & Privacy Data from Photos
exifRemover.description: Remove GPS location, camera details, and all EXIF metadata from your photos before sharing.

exifViewer.title: EXIF Viewer
exifViewer.fullTitle: EXIF Data Viewer - Read Full Image Metadata
exifViewer.description: View all EXIF data embedded in a photo including GPS coordinates, camera settings, and more.
